channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Responsive Clients Logo Gallery Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Responsive Clients Logo Gallery Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-0175|2024-08-02T05:02:43.678Z -- unknown -- responsive%20clients%20logo%20gallery%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Responsive Clients Logo Gallery Plugin for WordPress plugin through 1.1.9 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
